about_me.title: about me
about_me.summary: I am a programmer passionate about learning new skills and technologies. My programming journey began at university with C and C++, later leading me to Python due to my growing interest. The unique features of Python further fueled my enthusiasm, and since then, I have been striving to deepen my knowledge in this field.

tasks: Backend developer using Django and Python...
Designed and implemented databases using PostgreSQL and Redis.
Experienced in working with version control systems like Git and utilizing software development methodologies like Scrum.
Designed and implemented web APIs for front-end communication and used gRPC for low-level system interactions.
Installing, configuring, and managing Apache Kafka along with developing data consumers using Python for receiving, processing, and transferring data.
Designing, implementing, and managing PostgreSQL and SingleStore for data storage and retrieval.
Developing RESTful services using Flask and FastAPI.
Installing Linux and configuring related infrastructure such as iptables, Nginx, and other necessary tools.

projects.title: Client Management Website
projects.description: This project is a management website for a law office, including client management, case tracking, and notifications. The lawyer can record and track client and case details. It also supports SMS alerts for updates and internal notifications for hearings and case progress.

projects.title: Shift Supervisor
projects.description: This project is part of a PDMS (Plant Design Management System), designed for managing and analyzing daily data in an industrial environment. In this system, users with different access levels can enter their daily information related to their respective sections, while admins can generate various daily, monthly, and production reports.

projects.title: Shirino Hotel
projects.description: This project is a food reservation system for employees, allowing them to order food on specific days for themselves and their families. The priority system is automated or can be managed by the employer, with prioritized employees receiving SMS notifications to collect their meals.

projects.title: Tavana
projects.description: This project is a board management system that allows users to define pins and send or receive data on each pin. Using Django and Celery, tasks can be scheduled to run automatically at specified times. Docker is used for deployment, and RabbitMQ is used for message management, ensuring scalable and automated operations.
